meanings.sent1: The tattooer at the shop created beautiful designs.
meanings.sent2: The tattooer used a needle to make a dragon on my arm.
meanings.sent3: The tattooer joked that he could tattoo a smiley face on my toe.
meanings.sent4: The tattooer's needle danced on the canvas of my skin.
meanings.sent5: The tattooer's steady hand turned my idea into art.

meanings.definition: A person who applies permanent designs on the skin using ink.
meanings.sent1: The tattooer carefully inked a rose on her shoulder.
meanings.sent2: I went to the tattooer to get a meaningful symbol on my wrist.
meanings.sent3: The tattooer playfully suggested tattooing a tiny elephant on my ankle.
meanings.sent4: The tattooer's artistry transformed skin into a personal canvas.
meanings.sent5: The tattooer's skill brought my vision to life on my skin.
